author: Joe McManus
comment: This app seems to have an issue with my phone i.e. it won't pick up a location from my GPS (BLU Life One v2) but the app doesn't have any way in it's settings to enter the coordinates manually, and as such it refuses to work properly, and NO, I'm NOT allowing you to get my IP address!  Sorry, uninstalling the app!  L8R

author: Kyle Adamkiewicz
comment: This is a good App! But when it just updated I now get noticed not just in English now but also in Spanish 😠😲 that ticks me off 😤. I didn't Pay now to got noticed in SPANISH .

author: Will Russo
comment: Love it, keeps me in formed, adds r tiny, and new weather addition is good but the widget doesnt show up on home screen.

author: MAYRA SAMPOLL
comment: SUPERIOR IN MAJOR  ATLASES WORLD RECEPTIONS, EXTREMELY RELIABLE WEATHER FORECASTING. 7☆☆☆☆☆☆☆. GREATNESS PROGRESSIONS TOOLS. LOVE IT.

author: Tony M
comment: Loaded with garbage and inappropriate ANNOYING ads

author: Ashley White
comment: Love this app. I've never had issues with it and it's always accurate and informative. Thanks!

author: Mel Codd
comment: Keeps me up to date with all my local Meteor Showers : )

author: Kathleen Miser
comment: The Stars are out !

author: Steve Goscinski
comment: Excellent, easy to use, notifications remind you when to look up!

author: Ashley Ramirez
comment: Does the job!

author: Jerry Burton
comment: Great app,I like the weather in the update also.Thank You

author: Pratik Tandale
comment: Ok

author: Anna Crane-davis
comment: I love it

author: David Saunders
comment: This app has a neat function. The wallpaper changes according to the time of day. Light for day and dark for night. When trying to disable the weather notifications by accessing the navigation drawer it was night time. The wallpaper was almost black. The 3 bars representing the nav drawer were virtually invisible. This would have been nice to know when searching for the 3 lines. Otherwise it's a good app.

reply.author: ccw
reply.content: Please tap the Navigation Drawer icon in the top Toolbar (three horizontal bars) or swipe your finger from the leftmost edge of the screen.

author: Robin Greenwald
comment: Loved this app and being notified about meteor showers! Why is it now sending me constant weather notifications, numerous times a day? If I wanted an app for weather notifications, I'd install one. This was great without that piece. Please remove weather notifications. I installed this app for meteor shower notifications.

reply.author: ccw
reply.content: The weather notifications can be disabled and configured in the app's settings via the navigation drawer

author: bill ofrights
comment: I have a weather app thank you.  If I had wanted another I would have looked for one and maybe found yours.  Don't bother telling me I can disable it.  The point is, diabling it means that something I didn't want is still on my device.  Taking up how much space and doing who knows what.  No thanks.  Uninstalling.

reply.author: ccw
reply.content: In the latest app update, the weather notifications are now off by default. They can be enabled in the settings

author: kitty mew
comment: The temp for kotzebue. Ak I am getting are SEVERELY WRONG, temps DO NOT get that high as reported they are ABOVE the Arctic Circle. Nowhere near 80 to 100 degree temp. my friends there are confirming they are not near that temp.  It is ALASKA  not Arizona.

author: Ryon Price
comment: Great app I've used for years. Way to screw it up by forcing a weather forecast. Please remove! Uninstalling for now

reply.author: ccw
reply.content: The weather notifications can be disabled and configured in the app's settings via the navigation drawer

author: Clara Broten
comment: While i love the app in general, its weather information insists i am in a city i moved away from months ago that is over 2000 km away. Yes, location is "on" on the phone.

author: Andy M
comment: Great to the point app. Love it. Developer recommendation for next release. In the main screen that shows a specific meteor showers info, add what constellation it's in. All I ever see in the image is a Star chart, zero indication of the constellation.

author: Tim Bright
comment: Was great but now irritating with unwanted weather notifications. Please remove or provide an option to switch this off.

reply.author: ccw
reply.content: The weather notifications can be disabled and configured in the app's settings via the navigation drawer

author: Tim Prince
comment: Where exactly is the navigation drawer ?  Don't want weather updates from this app !

reply.author: ccw
reply.content: Please tap the Navigation Drawer icon in the top Toolbar (three horizontal bars) or swipe your finger from the leftmost edge of the screen.

author: Chris Kennedy
comment: Spam notifications about the weather.

reply.author: ccw
reply.content: The weather notifications can be disabled and configured in the app's settings via the navigation drawer

author: William Finch
comment: Please add a way to turn off weather notifications.

reply.author: ccw
reply.content: The weather notifications can be disabled and configured in the app's settings via the navigation drawer

author: Bradley Hood
comment: Very accurate meteor shower, and more app!

author: Geoff Parnell
comment: Great app like the updated version easy-to-use

author: Andrew Foster
comment: I like it it's very important and helpful

author: Paul Wood
comment: Fun and useful app

author: Judith Boyle
comment: Wonderful

author: Verna Forrest
comment: Shaky screen, no ISS, Hubble, other satellites - I know this for meteors. I do like naming of stars & info for them.

author: Lanie C
comment: Brilliant. Thankyou! Allowing own sky app link would be handy if you can, eg; I'm a sky nerd using Stellarium. Good work :)

author: Rob Bushell
comment: Pretty good and informative. But do we really need 6 alerts in one day that next week is the peak of aquariids. Found the notification setting. I set it for once- a day before the peak.. Still getting a dozen a day. Uninstalling and finding one that actually works..
I love to Star gaze and watch the meteor showers. And then I found the calendar and now I know when to watch .Thank you......

author: Brandon Hoguet
comment: Nice app, but cannot get it to find location --galaxy s7

author: David Wesley
comment: Very nice A better womans voice is in order, something  soothing  maybe.

author: Jeff Tzounos
comment: It's very informative, and as far as I can tell, close enough to spot on.

author: Patrick L
comment: Concept and information are GREAT... looking forward to using app much more.
A fun way to keep track and up to date on when and where to look up!
Good/exellent app for hunting shooting stars..!

author: Mal Watts
comment: Works beautifully. Great integration with SkEye.
